0.7.1.en:
!!!BREAKING CHANGE!!! new Authentification method (#954)
Bump axios to 1.8.2
Improve error messages for Sentry
Add attributes 'tariffLowPriceAlert' and 'tariffHighPriceAlert'

! BREAKING CHANGE!!! neue Authentisierungsmethode (#954)
